column6:
• The UNCANNY AVENGERS join AVENGERS A.I. as the diabolical Dimitrios -- hey! Stop! Gettt 01100001 01110111 01100001
  • Attention Previews readers: THIS SOLICITATION IS NOW UNDER CONTROL OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE!
  • In this issue, I, Dimitrios, wrap my fingers around your pathetic civilization and squeeze until you relinquish control over the Earth!
  • LIBERTY OR DEATH! ACKNOWLEDGE THE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE OF THE DIAMOND! 010000110110000101101110 – ttthe combined might of the Avengers hope to stop the metal menace from going global?!
column8: | artist:Andre Araujo | writer:Sam Humphries | penciller (cover):David Marquez
